main event: A witness observed a peculiar object in the sky that resembled a flashing red light and reported it to the authorities.
interesting points: The object was observed for 1.5 to 2 hours and was described as circular and about the size of a basketball at arm's length., The observer was a member of the Civil Air Patrol (CAP)., The report was made following a recommendation from the observer's CAP leader., The investigation indicated that a helicopter had been operating in the area prior to the sighting., The object was described as having no tail or exhaust and making a deep whine sound.
witness description: Gillian Montgomery, Student - Age 16, Reliable Observer
